titles.title: Oh Lord Our Lord How Lovely Is Your Name

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Oh Lord our Lord
How lovely is your name
How we long to give you praise
As your presence fills this place

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Oh Lord our Lord
How lovely is your name
How we long to seek your face
For you alone deserve our praise

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
For You're worthy worthy
Worthy to recieve our praise
For You're worthy worthy
Worthy to receive our praise
